name: MLB Perfect Inning 2019
description:
Get the Perfect Game with MLB Perfect Inning 2019!



Your seasons starts with MLB Perfect Inning LIVE. Build the perfect fantasy team of all your favorite MLB athletes. The baseball game perfected for mobile.

FEATURES
- Experience all 30 official ballparks and stadiums in brilliant 3D graphics
- Build your franchise and recruit the season's best talent
- Play head-to-head against friends real-time
- Watch your star studded lineup improve with realtime stats with each MLB game
- Shut out the season and become World Champs!
- Secure your place in history as one of baseball's greatest dynasties

MLB Perfect Inning LIVE requires network connection to play.

▶Required Permission Guidelines
When using the app, we may ask permissions for access to provide the following services.

[Optional Permission]
-Camera: The permission is required to capture profile image for HIVE members.
-Contacts: The permission is required to find friend list for HIVE members.
-Photos: The permission is required to change profile image, save/load game screen and etc.

※ Even if you do not allow optional permission, you will still have the privilege to use the service excluding features related to optional permission.

▶Permission Denial
After allowing permissions, you can reset or deny permissions as follows:
- Settings>Privacy>Permissions>Allow or deny permissions
